Sentencas: This study investigates the structure, phase stability, and electrical properties of BaCe0.8Y0.2-xNdxO3-delta (x = 0-0.2) in humid air.
Titulo: The effects of doped Nd on conductivity and phase stability of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ-based electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: XRD results indicate that a BaCe0.8Y0.2-xNdxO3-delta sample has an asymmetric orthorhombic structure, and this structure becomes more symmetric as the amount of Nd doping increases.
Titulo: The effects of doped Nd on conductivity and phase stability of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ-based electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The conductivity of BaCe0.8Y0.2-xNdxO3-delta depends on the amount of Nd doping and the operation temperature.
Titulo: The effects of doped Nd on conductivity and phase stability of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ-based electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: AC impedance results indicate that the resistance of BaCe0.8Y0.2-xNdxO3-delta decreases as the temperature increases, with the majority of resistance coming from oxygen ion diffusion.
Titulo: The effects of doped Nd on conductivity and phase stability of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ-based electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The XRD peak intensity of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-delta apparently decreased with time, forming Ba(OH)(2) and CeO2 second phases.
Titulo: The effects of doped Nd on conductivity and phase stability of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ-based electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The phase stability of BaCe0.8Y0.2-xNdxO3-delta (x =0.05-0.2) samples is much better than that of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-delta, and it exhibited no second phase after tested in an 80 degrees C water bath for 18 h. (C) 2011
Titulo: The effects of doped Nd on conductivity and phase stability of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ-based electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cell
